about_the_game:
Jasper's Dream is a first person puzzle game set in a techno mystic Egyptian world. Help Jasper, a robot programmed to create games, by solving his mind-bending puzzles. You will also explore an abandonned futuristic pyramid and unravel its many mysteries.



Follow the guide !
Follow Jasper, a flying robot with a strong personnality, he will be your guide inside the pyramid of Zerzura, renowned for its cult of games and the worship of Ptah, god of creation and creators. Unravel the mystery of the pyramid's abandonment and help its last resident, Jasper, to create a game.



Do you like sand ?
Use Jasper's sand gun to carry and spread magic sand on your environment and take advantage of their many properties to solve complex and fascinating puzzles.
Use Jasper's magic sands to bring electricity from generators to mechanisms like doors, moving platforms, lasers and more. The links you'll create range from simple lines to complex entanglement of multiple colors.



Gotta go fast !
Jasper will also test your platforming skills, be ready to run fast and jump high ! Some challenges will have you run against the clock.



Break the 4th wall
Jasper knows you are not from his world, he will adress YOU, the player, not the avatar you control. This will make for some akward interactions and funny easter eggs. Most of all, Jasper needs a player to test the result of his work and he will surely ask for your honest opinion.



A unique menu
Jasper doesn't really understand the concept of a menu for a game, he linked all the settings of the game to special gauges that the player can fill more or less to adjust the settings. You may have to use these gauges in some unconventional ways.
